resources.string: Have you ever moved or tidied up and packet 100eds of boxes? Have you ever unpacked or searched boxes and wondered where in the world you placed your china, or where is the box that holds your winter gear? Pack it up™ is an application to simplify this process and make moving, and box organizing fun and interactive, instead of mucky and unorganized. Pack it up™ is an application to organize boxes to location and Content to boxes. The service makes it possible to search for content and locate the box that holds these items and vice versa.
